alert.note: Alert for Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 17 at 9:46PM CDT until April 18 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Pembina, Eastern Walsh and Grand Forks Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Areas of heavy falling snow will significantly reduce the visibility. The gusty northwest winds tonight may result in areas of blowing snow and reduced visibilities.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina
